h8301.definition: the same as {{h8300}}; Sarid, a place in Palestine; Sarid.

h8302.definition: or שִׁרְיֹן; and שִׁרְיָן; also (feminine) שִׁרְיָה; and שִׁרְיֹנָה; from {{h8281}} in the original sense of turning; a corslet (as if twisted); breastplate, coat of mail, habergeon, harness. See {{h5630}}.

h8303.definition: and שִׂרְיֹן; the same as {{h8304}} (i.e. sheeted with snow); Shirjon or Sirjon, a peak of the Lebanon; Sirion.

h8304.definition: or שְׂרָיָהוּ; from {{h8280}} and {{h3050}}; Jah has prevailed; Serajah, the name of nine Israelites; Seraiah.

h8305.definition: from the same as {{h8321}} in the original sense of piercing; hetchelling (or combing flax), i.e. (concretely) tow (by extension, linen cloth); fine.

h8306.definition: from {{h8324}} in the original sense as in {{h8270}} (compare {{h8326}}); a cord, i.e. (by analogy) sinew; navel.

h8307.definition: from {{h8324}} in the sense of twisted, i.e. firm; obstinacy; imagination, lust.

h8308.definition: a primitive root; to interlace; traverse.

h8309.definition: probably by an orthographical error for {{h7709}}; a common; field.

h8310.definition: of foreign derivation; Sarsekim, a Babylonian general; Sarsechim.

h8311.definition: a primitive root; to prolong, i.e. (reflex) be deformed by excess of members; stretch out self, (have any) superfluous thing.

h8313.definition: a primitive root; to be (causatively, set) on fire; (cause to, make a) burn((-ing), up) kindle, × utterly.

h8314.definition: from {{h8313}}; burning, i.e. (figuratively) poisonous (serpent); specifically, a saraph or symbolical creature (from their copper color); fiery (serpent), seraph.

h8315.definition: the same as {{h8314}}; Saraph, an Israelite; Saraph.

h8317.definition: a primitive root; to wriggle, i.e. (by implication) swarm or abound; breed (bring forth, increase) abundantly (in abundance), creep, move.

h8318.definition: from {{h8317}}; a swarm, i.e. active mass of minute animals; creep(-ing thing), move(-ing creature).

h8319.definition: a primitive root; properly, to be shrill, i.e. to whistle or hiss (as a call or in scorn); hiss.

h8320.definition: from {{h8319}}; bright red (as piercing to the sight), i.e. bay; speckled. See {{h8291}}.

h8321.definition: or שׂוֹרֵק; and (feminine) שֹׂרֵקָה; from {{h8319}} in the sense of redness (compare {{h8320}}); a vine stock (properly, one yielding purple grapes, the richest variety); choice(-st, noble) wine. Compare {{h8291}}.

h8323.definition: a primitive root; to have (transitively, exercise; reflexively, get) dominion; × altogether, make self a prince, (bear) rule.

h8324.definition: a primitive root; to be hostile (only active participle an opponent); enemy.

h8325.definition: from {{h8324}}; hostile; Sharar, an Israelite; Sharar.

h8326.definition: from {{h8324}} in the sense of twisting (compare {{h8270}}); the umbilical cord, i.e. (by extension) a bodice; navel.

h8327.definition: a primitive root; to root, i.e. strike into the soil, or (by implication) to pluck from it; (take, cause to take) root (out).

h8328.definition: from {{h8327}}; a root (literally or figuratively); bottom, deep, heel, root.

h8329.definition: the same as {{h8328}}; Sheresh, an Israelite; Sharesh.

h8331.definition: from {{h8327}}; a chain (as rooted, i.e. linked); chain. Compare {{h8333}}.

h8332.definition: (Aramaic) from a root corresponding to {{h8327}}; eradication, i.e. (figuratively) exile; banishment.

h8333.definition: from {{h8327}} (compare {{h8331}}); a chain; (architectural) probably a garland; chain.

h8334.definition: a primitive root; to attend as a menial or worshipper; figuratively, to contribute to; minister (unto), (do) serve(-ant, -ice, -itor), wait on.

h8335.definition: infinitive of {{h8334}}; service (in the Temple); minister(-ry).

h8336.definition: or (for alliteration with {{h4897}}) שְׁשִׁי; for {{h7893}}; bleached stuff, i.e. white linen or (by analogy) marble; × blue, fine (twined) linen, marble, silk.

h8337.definition: masculine שִׁשָּׁה; a primitive number; see {{h7797}}; six (as an overplus	beyond five or the fingers of the hand); as ordinal sixth; six(-teen, -teenth), sixth.

h8338.definition: a primitive root; apparently,; to annihilate; leave by the sixth part (by confusion with {{h8341}}).

h8339.definition: of foreign derivation; Sheshbatstsar, Zerubbabel's Persian name; Sheshbazzar.

h8341.definition: a denominative from {{h8337}}; to sixth or divide into sixths; give the sixth participle

h8342.definition: or שָׂשֹׂן; from {{h7797}}; cheerfulness; specifically, welcome; gladness, joy, mirth, rejoicing.

h8343.definition: perhaps from {{h8336}}; whitish; Shashai, an Israelite; Shashai.

h8344.definition: probably for {{h8343}}; Sheshai, a Canaanite; Sheshai.

h8345.definition: from {{h8337}}; sixth, ordinal or (feminine) fractional; sixth (part).

h8346.definition: multiple of {{h8337}}; sixty; sixty, three score.

h8347.definition: of foreign derivation; Sheshak, a symbolic name of Babylon; Sheshach.

h8348.definition: perhaps for {{h7799}}; lily; Sheshan, an Israelite; Sheshan.

h8349.definition: probably from the base of {{h7785}}; pedestrian; Shashak, an Israelite; Shashak.

h8350.definition: perhaps from the base of {{h8324}} in the sense of that of {{h8320}}; red ochre (from its piercing color); vermillion.

h8352.definition: from {{h7896}}; put, i.e. substituted; Sheth, third son of Adam; Seth, Sheth.

h8354.definition: a primitive root; to imbibe (literally or figuratively); × assuredly, banquet, × certainly, drink(-er, -ing), drunk (× -ard), surely. (Prop. intensive of {{h8248}}.)

h8356.definition: from {{h7896}}; a basis, i.e. (figuratively) political or moral support; foundation, purpose.

h8357.definition: from {{h7896}}; the seat (of the person); buttock.

h8359.definition: from {{h7896}}; a fixture, i.e. the warp in weaving; warp.

h8362.definition: a primitive root; to transplant; plant.

h8363.definition: from {{h8362}}; a sprig (as if transplanted), i.e. sucker; plant.

h8364.definition: patronymically from {{h7803}}; a Shuthalchite (collectively) or descendants of Shuthelach; Shuthalhites.

h8365.definition: a primitive root; to unveil (figuratively); be open.

h8366.definition: a primitive root; (causatively) to make water, i.e. urinate; piss.

h8367.definition: a primitive root; to subside; be calm, cease, be quiet.

h8368.definition: a primitive root; to break out (as an eruption); have in (one's) secret parts.

h8369.definition: of foreign derivation; Shethar, a Persian satrap; Shethar.

h8370.definition: of foreign derivation; Shethar-Bozenai, a Persian officer; Shetharboznai.

h8371.definition: a primitive root; to place, i.e. array; reflex. to lie; be laid, set. t

h8372.definition: and (feminine) תָּאָה; (Ezekiel 40:12), from (the base of) {{h8376}}; a room (as circumscribed); (little) chamber.

h8373.definition: a primitive root; to desire; long.

h8374.definition: a primitive root (probably identical with {{h8373}} through the idea of puffing disdainfully at; compare {{h340}}); to loathe (morally); abhor.

h8376.definition: a primitive root; to mark off, i.e. (intensively) designate; point out.

h8377.definition: and תּוֹא; (the original form), from {{h8376}}; a species of antelope (probably from the white stripe on the cheek); wild bull (ox).

h8378.definition: from {{h183}} (abbreviated); a longing; by implication, a delight (subjectively, satisfaction, objectively, a charm); dainty, desire, × exceedingly, × greedily, lust(ing), pleasant. See also {{h6914}}.

h8379.definition: from {{h8376}}; a limit, i.e. full extent; utmost bound.

h8380.definition: or תָּאֹם; from {{h8382}}; a twin (in plural only), literally or figuratively; twins.

h8382.definition: a primitive root; to be complete; but used only as denominative from {{h8380}},; to be (causatively, make) twinned, i.e. (figuratively) duplicate or (architectural) jointed; coupled (together), bear twins.

h8384.definition: or (in the singular, feminine) תְּאֵנָה; perhaps of foreign derivation; the fig (tree or fruit); fig (tree).

h8385.definition: or תֹּאֲנָה; from {{h579}}; an opportunity or (subjectively) purpose; occasion.

h8387.definition: from {{h8385}} and {{h7887}}; approach of Shiloh; Taanath-Shiloh, a place in Palestine; Taanath-shiloh.

h8388.definition: a primitive root; to delineate; reflex. to extend; be drawn, mark out, (Rimmon-) methoar (by union with {{h7417}}).

h8389.definition: from {{h8388}}; outline, i.e. figure or appearance; beautiful, × comely, countenance,   fair, × favoured, form, × goodly, × resemble, visage.

h8390.definition: perhaps from {{h772}}; Taarea, an Israelite; Tarea. See {{h8475}}.

h8391.definition: from {{h833}}; a species of cedar (from its erectness); box (tree).

h8392.definition: perhaps of foreign derivation; a box; ark.

h8393.definition: from {{h935}}; income, i.e. produce (literally or figuratively); fruit, gain, increase, revenue.

h8394.definition: and (feminine) תְּבוּנָה; or תּוֹבֻנָה; from {{h995}}; intelligence; by implication, an argument; by extension, caprice; discretion, reason, skilfulness, understanding, wisdom.

h8395.definition: from {{h947}}; a treading down, i.e. ruin; destruction.

h8396.definition: from a root corresponding to {{h8406}}; broken region; Tabor, a mountain in Palestine, also a city adjacent; Tabor.

h8397.definition: apparently from {{h1101}}; mixture, i.e. unnatural bestiality; confusion.

h8398.definition: from {{h2986}}; the earth (as moist and therefore inhabited); by extension, the globe; by implication, its inhabitants; specifically, a particular land, as Babylonia, Palestine; habitable part, world.

h8400.definition: from {{h1101}} in the original sense of flowing; a cataract (in the eye); blemish.
